title: Pochampally Ikat
hero_image_alt: Geometric Ikat patterns on Pochampally fabric
short_description: A silk/cotton saree from Telangana known for its geometric patterns and the intricate Ikat dyeing style.
long_description:
Pochampally Ikat style of weaving features geometric patterns. In this technique (Double Ikat), the warp and weft threads are tied and dyed according to the design before weaving. The precision required to align the dyed threads during weaving makes it a highly skilled art. 

Pochampally is synonymous with silk, but cotton ikats are also popuar. It is lighter than other silks.

major_centres.title: Pochampally Village
major_centres.summary: One of the best tourism villages.

authenticity_tips: In authentic Ikat, the edges of the patterns are slightly blurry (hazy) due to the weave.
seo_title: Pochampally Ikat: The Geometric Weave of Telangana
seo_description: Discover Pochampally Ikat. Famous for its double ikat weaving technique, geometric patterns, and vibrant colors.
